description: A game created years ago, which helped me learn from my mistakesâ€”a source of motivation for my growth.

paragraphs: Undead Zone was one of my first major game projects, a zombie survival game that taught me invaluable lessons about game design, player feedback, and iterative development.

Though created years ago, this project remains a cornerstone of my development journey. Every bug fixed, every feature added, and every player review helped shape my approach to software development and problem-solving.
